name: reminders
description: Timers and reminders: schedule notifications for later. 'Remind me in 5 minutes', 'Set a timer for 20 minutes', 'Remind me at 3pm to call Mom'.

tools.name: set_reminder
tools.description: Set a reminder for a specific time. Use for 'remind me in X minutes', 'remind me at 3pm', 'remind me to X'.

tools.name: list_reminders
tools.description: List upcoming reminders. Use for 'show my reminders', 'what reminders do I have'.

tools.name: cancel_reminder
tools.description: Cancel a scheduled reminder by ID or message text. Use for 'cancel reminder', 'delete reminder about X'.

message.description: Message text to search for (if ID not known)

tools.name: set_timer
tools.description: Set a simple countdown timer. Use for 'set a timer for 5 minutes', 'timer 20 minutes'.

message.description: Optional message to show when timer finishes
